Command.CommandString: delete from WMS_BillMaster where BillID in ({0})
select detail.*,product.ProductName,product.CategoryName from WMS_BillDetail detail inner join VCMD_Product product on detail.ProductCode=product.ProductCode where {0} ORDER BY RowID

select task.*,Product.ProductName,state.StateDesc from WCS_TASK Task inner join CMD_Product Product on task.ProductCode=Product.ProductCode inner join Sys_TableState state on task.State=state.State and state.TableName='WCS_task' and state.FieldName='State' where task.ProductCode not in ('0001','0002') and {0} order by taskNo

select ProductCode,(InstockQty-isnull((select SUM(UnStockQty) from View_ProductQty where billid!=@BillID and ProductCode=tmp.ProductCode ),0)) as StockQty from View_ProductQTy tmp where ProductCode=@ProductCode and BarCode=@BarCode
update CMD_Cell set IsLock=@Lock from CMD_Cell cell inner join WMS_BillDetail sub on cell.CellCode=sub.NewCellCode where {0}
update CMD_Cell set IsLock=@Lock from CMD_Cell cell inner join WMS_BillDetail sub on cell.CellCode=sub.CellCode where {0}

select AreaCode,AreaName,ShelfCode,ShelfName,CellCode,CellName,CellRow,CellColumn,IsLock, PalletCode,PalletBarcode,ProductCode,ProductName,ProductTypeCode,ProductTypeName,AxieNo, BillNo,Quantity,InDate,StateNo,StateName from View_CMD_CELL_ALL where InDate is not null and {0}

select AreaName, ProductCode,ProductName,ProductTypeCode,ProductTypeName,AxieNo,StateNo,StateName,COUNT(1) as Qty from View_CMD_CELL_ALL Cell where InDate is not null and {0} group by AreaName,ProductCode,ProductName,ProductTypeCode,ProductTypeName,AxieNo,StateNo,StateName

SELECT Task.*,BillType.BillTypeName,StateName,Product.ProductName,Product.ProductTypeName,Product.AxieNo,TableState.StateDesc,car.CarName,crane.CraneName, (case when Task.TaskType='11' then Car.StationNo when Task.TaskType in('12','13','14') then Task.CellCode end) FromStation, (case when Task.TaskType in ('11','14') then Task.CellCode when Task.TaskType='12' then Car.StationNo when Task.TaskType='13' then Task.ToCellCode end) ToStation FROM WCS_TASK Task LEFT JOIN CMD_Car Car ON Task.CarNo = Car.CarNo left join CMD_Crane Crane on Task.CraneNo=crane.CraneNo left join VCMD_Product Product on task.ProductCode=Product.ProductCode left join CMD_ProductState ProductState on task.StateNo=ProductState.StateNo left join CMD_BillType BillType on task.BillTypeCode=billtype.BillTypeCode LEFT JOIN Sys_TableState TableState on TableState.TableName='WCS_TASK' and TableState.FieldName='State' and Task.State=TableState.State where Task.ProductCode not in ('0001','0002') and {0}
